class Location {
  num lat, lng; // instance variables
  
  Location(num lat, num lng) { // constructor with parameters
    this.lat = lat;
    this.lng = lng;
  }
}

void main() {
  var waikiki = new Location(21.271488, -157.822806);
  
  print(waikiki.lat);
  print(waikiki.lng);
}
